All that's left is to tell Plaain where: All that's left is to tell Plaain where to look for your movies and shows. You can always skip this step and come back later.
Here, you'll be able to find your recent: Here, you'll be able to find your recently watched movie or the show you didn't finish yet.
If all you're looking for is to get back: If all you're looking for is to get back on track: you can <2>find home this way</2>.
Index to look for new media on your link: Index to look for new media on your linked services or fetch the latest metadata.
It's likely that you just have to move s: It's likely that you just have to move some of your files around and create some folders to make it work.
Note that Plaain may <1>not</1> be used: Note that Plaain may <1>not</1> be used to stream pirated content or publicly share your private media library. You may only connect to your private cloud storage.
Plaain lets you stream and maintain your: Plaain lets you stream and maintain your media library from anywhere. No server needed, no fee required.
Plaain wasn't able to authenticate with: Plaain wasn't able to authenticate with {{provider}}. Please report this error if it persists.
Plaain wasn't able to connect to one of: Plaain wasn't able to connect to one of your services. Please report this incident. Status code: {{status}}. Message: {{message}}.
Reference the getting started guide to l: Reference the getting started guide to learn how to organize your files so that Plaain finds them. After you're done, just re-index.
Select which service you want to use to: Select which service you want to use to stream your movies & shows.

The video doesn't load? Restarting may h: The video doesn't load? Restarting may help. Please <2>report the issue</2> if it persists.

To watch your movies and TV shows, you f: To watch your movies and TV shows, you first have to sign in with the cloud service that hosts your media.
We weren't able to locate the file named: We weren't able to locate the file named {{name}} located in your {{provider}} provider.
